Detailed Description

Caret specialized for multi-tab input-mode.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

UINT32  blink_rate,
BOOLEAN  show_preview = TRUE,
Caret::Mode  mode = Insert
) 
 

Parameters:
editor Pointer to the corresponding editor.
blink_rate Blink speed of the caret.
show_preview When TRUE, the preview of the tabbing is shown inside the editor.
mode See Caret::Mode.
